creator: gvdinesh@lycos.com
text:
We are running our java server as a service in Windows and while generating the 
pdf file we are getting the error

"/ by zero"

We also tried setting buffer file but in vain. Is this a known bug. 

Thanks,
Dinesh

creator: oleg@tkachenko.com
text:
Oh boy, are you really using fop 0.15???? Then upgrade to the latest version first.
If that's a typo - this kind of error is usually generated not by FOP itself,
but by Xalan, see fop-user archives for more details.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
